version_description:
優化了一些細節
修復了已知的bug
新增了曲子《Kuraki》
添加了全新的人物&角色

-New song “Bambi”

-Bugfixes…

- Added two new songs!
- New character “Emily” & Mysterious character!
- More fun game play with daily fun task! Earn free gold!
- Smooth and silky! Game operation details optimization;
- Say goodbye to Crash! Fix known bug;
- New game iCon, cheers for the coming Christmas!

- 全新玩法，4条线不再拥挤
- 两首新歌！游戏新增曲目两首；
- 新增新成员“Emily”及一位神秘人物；
- 乐趣再升级，每日任务赚乐币啦；
- 丝滑顺畅！游戏操作细节优化；
- 告别闪退！修复已知游戏Bug；
- 全新的游戏头像，为即将到来的圣诞节，干杯！

- New Way to play!
- Added two new songs!
- More fun game play with daily fun task! Earn free gold!
- Smooth and silky! Game operation details optimization;
- Say goodbye to Crash! Fix known bug;
- New game iCon, cheers for the coming Christmas!

- Spectral Plane Optimization: Some songs have been optimized in depth.
- Elf System Optimization: Open Entrance to Selection Interface
• Elves need to be unlocked and upgraded, up to level 5
•Elf function optimization can play a more important role in supporting character songs
• Elves have acquired new abilities to produce coins at any time and give them to you every time you go online.
• Fairy upgrades can be acquired through games or by shopping mall coins.
- Segment points clear: the new season is coming, there will be more generous rewards!
- Repair known BUG

Tips：
Instructions on the use of amblyopia / hyperopia training:
1: first, you need to choose special skin for [amblyopia / hyperopia] in the game (those with normal vision are not recommended)
2: the principle of hyperopia is to increase vision by using the sensitivity of awakening visual cells such as red light, blue light, lattice light and afterimage light to stimulate eyeball development and enhance vision.
